pages.text: The third tab of the maids' GUI is the bauble inventory. This mod provides several baubles that can be triggered to protect maids under certain conditions:$(li)Ultramarine Orb Elixir: Can be used 6 times to avoid a maid's death.$(li)Tombstone Bauble: Tombstones that generate upon a maid's death to preserve their items.

$(li)Protect Bauble: When the maid receives the corresponding damage, the damage event is canceled.$(li)Nimble Fabric: When a maid equipped with this bauble is hit by projectile, her behavior will be exactly the same as the ender.
